intents.name: LiveCommentary
samples: I would like to hear live commentary

intents.name: CurrentMatch
samples: Tell me about the ongoing cricket match.

intents.name: BattingStyle
samples: How is Virat Kohli playing Describe his batting style

intents.name: BowlingStyle
samples: What about the bowling side Tell me about the Australia bowlers.

intents.name: KeyMoments
samples: Are there any key moments in the match I want to feel the excitement

intents.name: PlayerStatistics
samples: Can you provide me with some statistics about the players

intents.name: Predictions
samples: I'd like to know the match predictions. What are the chances of India winning

intents.name: LiveCommentaryHindi
samples: I would like to hear live commentary in hindi

intents.name: MatchUpdates
samples: Thanks Alexa Can you notify me about any important updates during the match
